Doskvol.Name: Barrowcleft
Doskvol.Description: Residences and markets for the farmers who work the fields and eeleries.

Doskvol.Name: Brightstone
Doskvol.Description: The grand mansions and luxury shops of the wealthy elite.

Doskvol.Name: Charhollow
Doskvol.Description: A crowded district of tenements and stacked houses.

Doskvol.Name: Charterhall
Doskvol.Description: The city’s civic offices and the hub for shops, artisans, and commerce.

Doskvol.Name: Coalridge
Doskvol.Description: The remnants of Doskvol’s original hilltop mining settlement, now home to laborers and industrial factories.

Doskvol.Name: Crow's Foot
Doskvol.Description: A cramped neighborhood of multi-level streets, ruled by gangs.

Doskvol.Name: The Docks
Doskvol.Description: Rough taverns, tattoo parlors, fighting pits, and warehouses.

Doskvol.Name: Dunslough
Doskvol.Description: A labor camp served by convicts and a ghetto for the destitute poor.

Doskvol.Name: Nightmarket
Doskvol.Description: The trade center for exotic goods imported by rail. Many vendors also trade in illicit goods.

Doskvol.Name: Silkshore
Doskvol.Description: The 'red lamp district' and artist community

Doskvol.Name: Six Towers
Doskvol.Description: A formerly rich district, now worn down and dilapidated.

Doskvol.Name: Whitecrown
Doskvol.Description: The sprawling estates of the Lord Governor, Hunter Commander, Master Warden, and Doskvol Academy.

ShatteredIsles.Name: Severos
ShatteredIsles.Description: A land of windswept plains, covered in dark scrub and thorny growths. Outside the Imperial cities on the coast, some native Serverosi still live in free tribes, scavenging the death-lands on their ghost-hunting horses. They are generally brown-skinned and dark-haired.

ShatteredIsles.Name: Iruvia
ShatteredIsles.Description: A land of black deserts, obsidian mountains, and raging volcanoes. Some say that positions of power are openly held by demons in Iruvia. The people are generally amber-skinned and dark-haired.

ShatteredIsles.Name: The Dagger Isles
ShatteredIsles.Description: A tropical archipelago covered in dense jungle growth; now turned dark and twisted from the strange magic of the cataclysm. Some say that the people there live without lightning barriers. How do they manage that? Native islanders are generally copper-skinned and dark-haired.

ShatteredIsles.Name: Skovlan
ShatteredIsles.Description: A ragged land of cold mountains and rough tundra. Skovlan was the last holdout against Imperial control. They are generally pale-skinned and fair-haired or red-haired.

ShatteredIsles.Name: Tycheros
ShatteredIsles.Description: A far off land, disconnected from the Empire. People say the Tycherosi (rudely called 'Strangers') have demon blood in their lineage.
